original_text: One day, when the child was older, he went out to see his father. His father was working in a field with his men at harvest time.
korean_text: 그 아이가 자라매 하루는 추수꾼들에게 나가서 그의 아버지에게 이르렀더니

sentences.original_text: One day, when the child was older,
sentences.korean_translation: 어느 날, 그 아이가 자랐을 때,

sentences.original_text: he went out to see his father.
His father was working in a field
with his men at harvest time.
